product_title: Charlie Espadrille Platform Wedge Slide Sandal
product_description: A half-wrapped ring and toggle hardware highlight the double-band upper of this chic and easy sandal lifted by an espadrille-inspired platform wedge.
product_details_and_care:
A half-wrapped ring and toggle hardware highlight the double-band upper of this chic and easy sandal lifted by an espadrille-inspired platform wedge. A gleaming rand at the heel adds an extra dash of flash to every step.
3" heel; 1 1/4" platform
Leather or genuine calf-hair (Vietnam) upper/synthetic lining and sole
Imported
Women's Shoes
Item #6080351
